allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add fast-path geometry optimizations and new surface processors

- Add decoder fast functions: get_first_entity_ref_fast, get_polyloop_coords_fast, 
  get_polyloop_coords_cached with point caching for BREP-heavy files
- Add parser has_non_null_attribute\(\) for fast attribute filtering
- Add FaceBasedSurfaceModelProcessor for IfcFaceBasedSurfaceModel
- Add SurfaceOfLinearExtrusionProcessor for IfcSurfaceOfLinearExtrusion
- Optimize FacetedBrep with fast-path using get_face_bound_fast
- Add WASM-specific sequential iteration \(avoid threading overhead\)
- Fix tuple destructuring: correctly use \(loop_id, orientation, is_outer\)

Performance: ~2x faster on BREP-heavy files due to point caching and 
reduced entity decoding overhead.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(head -20 echo "" echo "=== FM_ARC_DigitalHub.ifc ===" find tests/models -name "FM_ARC*" -exec grep -oE "IFC[A-Z]+SURFACE" {} ;)
